SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.services.GameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object
Service class that handles business logic for game management operations. Provides methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting games, as well as various search functionalities.

      Returns:
      List of games meeting the rating criteria
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rating is not between 0 and 5
